description: Festive, rich & fruity Christmas Vegan Mincemeat steeped in boozy deliciousness! If you're looking for a mincemeat without suet recipe then I've got you covered! This is a Christmas staple that is really easy to make & can be used in all of your festive baking. It's also perfect for gifting.
keywords: christmas mincemeat, vegan mincemeat tart, vegetarian mincement
name: Vegan Mincemeat
recipeIngredient: 300g / 2 slightly heaped cups raisins (, (see recipe notes regarding substitutions for the dried fruits listed)
140g / 1 cup slivered almonds (, (you can omit to make the recipe nut free)
225g / 1 1/2 cup coconut sugar or brown sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Put all of the ingredients except the port in a large ovenproof bowl or casserole and mix together well.
Cover tightly with tin foil or a lid and place in the oven. Leave to warm in the oven for 90 minutes.
Remove from the oven and allow to cool.
Add the port and stir really well.
Transfer the mixture into clean jars. Be sure to sterilize them if you will be storing for an extended period. See recipe notes below for how to sterilize.
